Empanadas - beef & cheese!This place is so much fun.  I only wish we had a vibrant outdoor market with food bars here in the Bay Area.You grab a seat on a first come first serve basis and you need to eat quickly, because there are people hovering, just waiting to grab your seat when you're done.  Service is friendly and they make whatever is fresh.  You need to be ok with them throwing live seafood on the grill or in the pot.  And, the menu changes so ask what's fresh and then be open to whatever lands on your plate.  The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because it's expensive.  You're paying top notch price for the location and the experience.Happy travels!
